local Tool = script.Parent -- Sound Object PenguinSound = script.PenguinSound
--Animation local walkAnim local JumpAnim
-- Reduce the walking speed of the character walkSpeed = Tool:FindFirstChild("Humanoid").WalkSpeed walkSpeed = walkSpeed/2.0
-- If the character jumps switch the animation function onJump() --if walkAnim then --walkAnim:Stop() --end JumpAnim = Tool:FindFirstChild("Humanoid"):LoadAnimation(script.PenguinJump) JumpAnim:Play() print("PENGUIN JUMP") wait(0.4) JumpAnim:Stop() --walkAnim:Play() Tool:FindFirstChild("Humanoid").WalkSpeed = 8.0 wait(0.7) --walkAnim:Stop() Tool:FindFirstChild("Humanoid").WalkSpeed = 16.0 end
-- Listen for the jump event of the character Tool:FindFirstChild("Humanoid").Jumping:connect(onJump)
-- Animation + Gyro logic if Tool ~= nil then local myHumanoid = Tool:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid ~= nil then local myTorso = Tool:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not myTorso then return end
walkAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(script.PenguinWalk) -- Create the 3 frames for the gyro torsoFrame_1 = myTorso.CFrame torsoFrame_2 = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0.0, 0.0, math.pi/18) torsoFrame_3 = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0.0, 0.0, -math.pi/18)
-- halve the walking speed myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = walkSpeed -- Make a body gyro and attach it to the object bodyGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") bodyGyro.P = 100000 bodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(0.0, 0.0, bodyGyro.P) bodyGyro.cframe = torsoFrame_1 bodyGyro.Parent = myTorso -- Total Animation + Gyro time is 7 * 2.4 = 16.8 seconds for j = 1, 7, 1 do PenguinSound:Play() walkAnim:Play() -- Apply the gyro for 2.4 seconds, approx time of the animation for i = 1, 5, 1 do bodyGyro.cframe = torsoFrame_2 wait(0.12) bodyGyro.cframe = torsoFrame_1 wait(0.12) bodyGyro.cframe = torsoFrame_3 wait(0.12) bodyGyro.cframe = torsoFrame_1 wait(0.12) end end -- Remove the Gyro bodyGyro:remove() walkAnim:Stop() PenguinSound:Stop() end end
-- Reset the humanoid's speed Tool:FindFirstChild("Humanoid").WalkSpeed = 16.0
wait(0.5) script:remove()
